title: createLabel
description: Request a new label, which may be domestic or international, including consignments

carrier.description: Indicates the carrier - COURIERPOST, PACE or PARCELPOST, e.g. PACE

orientation.description: Print orientation - PORTRAIT or LANDSCAPE, e.g. PORTRAIT

format.description: Indicates the format the label should be produced in. E.g. pdf

logo_id.description: Unique identifier for merchants logo. E.g. AC37BFDB-187C-4691-BB7B-0BB2F8791FB7

notification_endpoint.description: Indicates the merchants webhook URL to receive notification when the label has been generated. E.g. https://yourendpoint.co.nz/labels/status

job_number.description: Indicates the Pace Job Booking Number. E.g. 8265

delivery_choice_type.description: Additional service requested for the delivery. E.g. 1

sender_reference_1.description: Sender's reference for the consignment. Will be printed on the label. E.g. Order123

sender_reference_2.description: Sender's reference (e.g. cost center number for CP manifesting). Will not be printed on the label. E.g. CC52

paper_dimensions.description: This object allows the merchant to specify the paper size upon which to print the label.

width_cm.description: Width the label will be printed to. E.g. 17.4

height_cm.description: Height the label will be printed to. E.g. 10

stationery_size.description: Allows merchants to specify the paper size upon which to print the label. E.g. A5

name.description: Indicates the name of the sender. E.g. Joe Sender

phone.description: Indicates the phone number of the sender. E.g. +64-27-111-1111

email.description: Indicates the email address of the sender. E.g. joe.sender@acme.axx.nz

fax.description: Contact fax number of the sending party. E.g. +64-27-222-2222

company_name.description: Indicates the company name of the sender as it should appear on the label. E.g. Acme Products

site_code.description: Indicates the site code assigned to the address where the parcel will be picked up by the courier. ?This address is also used for the NZ Post manifest process. E.g. 12345

customs_code.description: Customs code of the sender. E.g. HGB321547

signatory.description: Contact name of person signing the parcel. E.g. Stephen Signatory

freepost_number.description: For ParcelPost Domestic Return labels this is FreePost number of the sender. E.g. 106

pickup_address.description: An object containing the pick up address.

address_id.description: Indicates the Address ID for the pick up address sourced from the ParcelAddress API. E.g. 198024

dpid.description: Indicates the Address ID for the pickup address sourced from the ParcelAddress API. E.g. 12345

site_code.description: Specifies the parcel source address printed on the label and can be different from the pickup address. E.g. 12345

company_name.description: The name of company sending the parcel. E.g. Acme Products

building_name.description: The building name. E.g. Acme Products House

unit_type.description: Indicates the type of unit. E.g. Flat

unit_value.description: Indicates the value of the unit type. E.g. 2

floor.description: Indicates the floor of the address. E.g. 2

street.description: Name and number of the street. E.g. 151 Victoria Street West

suburb.description: The name of the suburb. E.g. East Tamaki

city.description: The name of the city. E.g. Auckland

state.description: Regional, provincial or county name that the sending party?s address belongs to. E.g. NI

locality_code.description: Country subdivision code identifier that the sending party?s address belongs to. E.g. WA

country_code.description: Two letter country code. E.g. NZ

postcode.description: Postal or zip code of the sender. E.g. 1411

private_bag_number.description: For ParcelPost Domestic Return labels this is Private Bag number of that the parcel will be delivered to. E.g. 12345

po_box_number.description: For ParcelPost Domestic Return labels this is PO Box number of that the parcel will be delivered to. E.g. 12345

name.description: Named person to receive the parcel. E.g. Jack Receiver

phone.description: Contact phone number of person receiving the parcel. E.g. +64-27-111-1111

email.description: Indicates the email address of the receiver. E.g. j.receiver@beta.xx.nz

vat_number.description: The VAT or GST number of the consignee. E.g. 747-11-8051

registration_number.description: Registration number of the consumer required for Delivery Location Options. E.g. XY54

delivery_address.description: An object containing the delivery address.

location_type.description: Type of delivery requested for the item. E.g. SHP

address_id.description: Indicates the Address ID for the delivery address sourced from the ParcelAddress API. E.g. 198024

dpid.description: Indicates the Address ID for the delivery address sourced from the ParcelAddress API. E.g. 12345

site_code.description: Specifies the parcel delivery address printed on the label. E.g. 12345

is_collection.description: Indicates whether the delivery address is a NZ Post collection point. E.g. false

building_name.description: The building name. E.g. Beta Company House

company_name.description: The name of company the parcel is being delivered to. E.g. Beta Company

unit_type.description: Indicates the type of unit. E.g. Suite

unit_value.description: Indicates the value of the unit type. E.g. 5

floor.description: Indicates the floor of the address. E.g. 3

street.description: Name and number of the street. E.g. 1600 Pennsylvania Avenue

suburb.description: The name of the suburb. E.g. Washington Central

city.description: The name of the city. E.g. Washington

state.description: State the delivery city is in. ?If no state, enter country. E.g. Delaware

locality_code.description: The code that represents the region,province or county. E.g. DE

country_code.description: Two letter country code. E.g. NZ

postcode.description: Postal or zip code of the receiver. E.g. 89102

instructions.description: Delivery instructions for courier. E.g. Ring doorbell

parcel_details.description: An object containing the label details for each label in the consignment.

service_code.description: Code to represent a delivery service. E.g. PCM3C4

add_ons.description: Contains an array of ancillary codes. E.g. CPSR

return_indicator.description: This is used to indicate if the label generated is used for returning items. E.g. OUTBOUND

receiver_charging_arrangement.description: The duty and tax payment method as it applies to the item. E.g. DDU

undeliverable_instructions.description: Instructions in case of non-delivery. E.g. NONE

cms_codes.description: Array of codes that will be translated to a NetDespatch service code. E.g. PCMXT25

description.description: The box size name on the label for the dispatching person to choose the correct box for packing. E.g. LARGE

insurance_required.description: Indicates whether insurance is required for the parcel. E.g. true

nature_of_transaction_code.description: Category of goods that appears on the CN23 form. E.g. 21

postage_paid_amount.description: Monetary value of postage that sender has paid. E.g. 23.45

additional_fee_amount.description: Monetary value of other fees that sender has paid. E.g. 12.5

insured_value_amount.description: Monetary value the parcel items are insured for. E.g. 70

currency.description: The currency code for the parcel. E.g. AUD

dimensions.description: An object containing dimension details for this parcel.

volume_m3.description: Indicates the volume of the item being sent. E.g. 0.025

weight_kg.description: The physical weight of the parcel in kilograms. E.g. 2.55

dangerous_goods.description: This object contains hazard identification information.

type_code.description: Indicates the United Nations Dangerous Goods identification code for dangerous items. E.g. 5231

parcel_contents.description: Contains an array of parcel contents

content_number.description: The number specifying an item in the shipment. E.g. 3

description.description: Human readable description of the parcel contents. E.g. Light bulb

harmonised_system_tariff.description: Indicates the internationally standardized name and number of the classification of the parcel (applies to all parcel contents). E.g. 12121212

quantity.description: The quantity of units within the parcel. E.g. 2

weight_kg.description: The combined weight of each item in the parcel. E.g. 1.2

value.description: The dollar value total of each item within the parcel. E.g. 5.1

country_code.description: Country code of the location in which the content piece was produced or manufactured. E.g. CN

type.description: The document type. Value must be one of LIC, 811, 911. See description from UPU code list 184. E.g. 911

identifier.description: The value entered on the CN23 license box. E.g. ?
